name: MeetupUserActivityWidget
author: Fabrizio Ferraiuolo

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to integrate your wordpress blog with the platform capabilities of meetup.
This provides a widget that allows you to view a list of recent activities of your group meetup.
sections.installation:
The quickest method for installing the importer is:

  1. Visit Tools -> Import in the WordPress dashboard
  2. Click on the WordPress link in the list of importers
  3. Click “Install Now”
  4. Finally click “Activate Plugin & Run Importer”

If you would prefer to do things manually then follow these instructions:

  1. Upload the wordpress-importer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Tools -> Import screen, click on WordPress

short_description: Allows you to integrate your wordpress blog with the platform capabilities of meetup
